headline: Senate passes stablecoin bill, a major victory for the crypto world
summary: The Senate on Tuesday passed a bill that would establish the first federal framework for dollar-backed cryptocurrencies known as stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

raw.headline: Senate passes stablecoin bill, a major victory for the crypto world
raw.summary: The Senate on Tuesday passed a bill that would establish the first federal framework for dollar-backed cryptocurrencies known as stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

headline: Amazon CEO Says AI Will Lead to Smaller Workforce
summary: Referring to the impact of artificial intelligence, Andy Jassy tells employees, “We expect that this will reduce our total corporate workforce.”

headline: Crypto hails Senate vote on stablecoin bill as a major victory
summary: The Senate is preparing for a final vote Tuesday on a bill that would establish the first federal framework for dollar-backed cryptocurrencies known as stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

raw.headline: Crypto hails Senate vote on stablecoin bill as a major victory

headline: BAC Stands Out as a Hidden Gem Among Dividend Stocks

headline: SoftBank Sells T-Mobile Stake for $4.8 Billion to Fund AI Push
